401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

parameters.name: with
parameters.description:
Includes the specified information in the results. More than one parameter should be separated by commas. The following parameters are available:
  • 'additionalSkus' = The additional skus of the variation.
  • 'attributeValues' = The attribute values of the variation.
  • 'attributeValues.attribute' = Includes attributeValues. The attribute data to the related attribute ID.
  • 'attributeValues.attributeValue' = Includes attributeValues. The attribute value data to the related attribute value ID.
  • 'barcodes' = The barcodes of the variation.
  • 'barcodes.barcode' = Includes barcodes. The barcode data to the related barcode ID.
  • 'base' = The variation base.
  • 'base.item' = Includes base. The item data of the variation.
  • 'base.itemSerialNumber' = Includes base. The item serial numbers of the variation.
  • 'base.feedback' = Includes base. The feedback of the variation.
  • 'base.characteristics' = Includes base. The characteristics of the variation.
  • 'base.crossSelling' = Includes base. The cross selling items of the variation.
  • 'base.texts' = Includes base. The texts of the variation.
  • 'base.availability' = Includes base. The availability data related to the variation's availability ID.
  • 'base.images' = Includes base. The images linked to the item.
  • 'base.shippingProfiles' = Includes base. The shipping profiles linked to the item.
  • 'base.stock' = Includes base. The stock of the variation.
  • 'base.stockStorageLocations' = Includes base. The stock storage locations of the variation.
  • 'bundleComponents' = The bundle components of the variation.
  • 'categories' = The categories of the variation.
  • 'categories.category' = Includes categories. The related category data for each category ID.
  • 'categories.categoryBranch' = Includes categories. The related category branch data for each category ID.
  • 'clients' = The clients of the variation.
  • 'defaultCategories' = The default categories of the variation
  • 'defaultCategories.category' = Includes defaultCategories. The category data to the related category ID.
  • 'images' = The images of the variation
  • 'images.image' = Includes images. The image data to the related image ID.
  • 'markets' = The markets of the variation.
  • 'marketIdentNumbers' = The market ident numbers of the variation
  • 'salesPrices' = The sales prices of the variation.
  • 'salesPrices.salesPrice' = Includes salesPrices. The sales price data to the related sales price ID.
  • 'skus' = The skus of the variation.
  • 'supplier' = The supplier of the variation.
  • 'supplier.supplier' = Includes supplier. The contact data to the related supplier ID.
  • 'timestamps' = The timetamps of the variation.
  • 'warehouses' = The warehouses of the variation
  • 'warehouses.warehouse' = Includes warehouses. The warehouse data to the related warehouse ID.
  • 'unit' = The unit of the variation
  • 'unit.unit' = Includes unit. The unit data of the related unit ID.
  • 'tags' = The tags of the variation.
  • 'tags.tag' = Includes tags. The tag data to the related tag ID.
  • 'properties' = The properties of the variation.
  • 'properties.property' = Includes properties. The property data to the related property ID.
  • 'comments' = The comments of the variation.
  • 'inheritance' = The inheritance of the variation.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
Sorts the results. Append '_asc' or '_desc' to specify the sorting order. '_desc' is the default value if no other is specified. More than one parameter should be separated by commas. The following parameters are available:
  • 'id'
  • 'itemId'
  • 'isMain'
  • 'position'
  • 'availabilityId'
  • 'createdAt'
  • 'updatedAt'
  • 'itemUpdatedAt'
  • 'relatedUpdatedAt'

parameters.name: groupBy
parameters.description:
Groups the result. The following parameters are available:
  • 'itemId' = Groups the result by the item ID.
  • 'itemAttributeValue' = Groups the result by the attribute with the flag 'isGroupable'.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations matching the specified query

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations with the specified IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas. If you use this filter no other filter will be considered. Limited to 500 ids

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations with the specified item ID. Limited to 100 ids

parameters.name: itemIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations with the specified item IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which are active/inactive.

parameters.name: isMain
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which are main/not main.

parameters.name: isSalable
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which are salable.

parameters.name: supplierId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have the given supplier ID.

parameters.name: availabilityIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations with the specified availability IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: hasChildren
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have children.

parameters.name: hasActiveChildren
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have active children.

parameters.name: attributeId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have the specified attribute ID.

parameters.name: anyAttributeId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have any of the specified attribute IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: allAttributeIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have all specified attribute IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: attributeValueId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have the specified attribute value ID.

parameters.name: anyAttributeValueId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have the any of the specified attribute value IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: allAttributeValueIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have all specified attribute value IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: barcodeCode
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have a barcode with the specified code.

parameters.name: barcodeId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have a barcode with the specified ID.

parameters.name: bundleType
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations with the specified bundle type.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have the specified category ID.

parameters.name: anyCategoryId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have any of the specified category IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: allCategoryIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have all specified category IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: anyCharacteristicId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have any of the specified characteristic IDs.

parameters.name: allCharacteristicIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have all specified characteristic IDs.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have the specified client ID.

parameters.name: anyClientId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have any of the specified client IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: allClientIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have all specified client IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: automaticClientVisibilities
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have any of the specified automatic client visibilities. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: imageHasMarketId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have an image available for the specified market ID.

parameters.name: flag1
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations with the specified flag one.

parameters.name: flag2
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations with the specified flag two.

parameters.name: manufacturerId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations with the specified manufacturer ID.

parameters.name: anyManufacturerId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations with any of the specified manufacturer IDs.

parameters.name: itemType
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have the specified item type.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have the specified market ID.

parameters.name: anyMarketId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have any of the specified market IDs.

parameters.name: referrerIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have/not have any of the specified market IDs.

parameters.name: allMarketIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have all specified market IDs.

parameters.name: priceBetween
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have a sales price between the specified minimum and maximum value. Minimum and maximum value should be separated by a comma.

parameters.name: priceBetweenById
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations where the specified sales price is between the specified minimum and maximum value. Sales price ID, Minimum and maximum value should be separated by a comma.

parameters.name: priceCalculationUuid
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations with the specified price calculiation uuid.

parameters.name: salesPriceIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which match specified sales price IDs criteria. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: anySalesPriceId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have any of the specified sales price IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

parameters.name: propertySelectionId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have the specified property selection ID.

parameters.name: anyPropertySelectionId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have any of the specified property selection IDs.

parameters.name: allPropertySelectionIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have all specified property selection IDs.

parameters.name: hasNameInLanguage
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have a name in the specified language.

parameters.name: bundleComponentVariationId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have the specified bundle component variation ID.

parameters.name: warehouseIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the result to variations which meet the specified warehouse id criteria. Allowed operators are: 'eq', 'not', 'nin' and 'in'.

parameters.name: netStock
parameters.description: Filter restricts the result to variations which meet the specified net stock criteria. Allowed operators are: 'eq', 'lt', 'lte', 'gt' and 'gte'.

parameters.name: physicalStock
parameters.description: Filter restricts the result to variations which meet the specified physical stock criteria. Allowed operators are: 'eq', 'lt', 'lte', 'gt' and 'gte'.

parameters.name: itemNames
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations matching any name of the item.

parameters.name: itemName1
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations matching name 1 of the item

parameters.name: itemName2
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations matching name 2 of the item.

parameters.name: itemName3
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations matching name 3 of the item.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which matching the number of the variation.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which matching the model of the variation.

parameters.name: supplierItemNumber
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which matching the supplier item number of the variation.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Specifies the language of the language-dependent filters

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have been created in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: itemCreatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose item has been created in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: itemUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose item has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: availabilityUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose availablity has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: stockUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose stock has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: barcodeUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose barcodes has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: categoryUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose categories has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: clientUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose clients has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: marketUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose markets has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: propertyUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose properties has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: salesPriceUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose sales prices have been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: supplierUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose suppliers has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: tagUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose tags has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: warehouseUpdatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations whose warehouse has been updated in the specified time frame. The from and to parameter should be separated by a comma. If there is no to value, the current time is used instead.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The requested page of results. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of results per page. Maximum value is 250. Default value is 50.

parameters.name: hasLowestPrice
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which has or has not lowest price.

parameters.name: with
parameters.description:
Includes the specified information in the results. More than one parameter should be separated by commas. The following parameters are available:
  • 'additionalSkus' = The additional skus of the variation.
  • 'attributeValues' = The attribute values of the variation.
  • 'attributeValues.attribute'/b> = Includes attributeValues. The attribute data to the related attribute ID.
  • 'attributeValues.attributeValue' = Includes attributeValues. The attribute value data to the related attribute value ID.
  • 'barcodes' = The barcodes of the variation.
  • 'barcodes.barcode' = Includes barcodes. The barcode data to the related barcode ID.
  • 'base' = The variation base.
  • 'base.item' = Includes base. The item data of the variation.
  • 'base.itemSerialNumber' = Includes base. The item serial numbers of the variation.
  • 'base.feedback' = Includes base. The feedback of the variation.
  • 'base.characteristics' = Includes base. The characteristics of the variation.
  • 'base.crossSelling' = Includes base. The cross selling items of the variation.
  • 'base.texts' = Includes base. The texts of the variation.
  • 'base.availability' = Includes base. The availability data related to the variation's availability ID.
  • 'base.images' = Includes base. The images linked to the item.
  • 'base.shippingProfiles' = Includes base. The shipping profiles linked to the item.
  • 'base.stock' = Includes base. The stock of the variation.
  • 'base.stockStorageLocations' = Includes base. The stock storage locations of the variation.
  • 'bundleComponents' = The bundle components of the variation.
  • 'categories' = The categories of the variation.
  • 'categories.category' = Includes categories. The related category data for each category ID.
  • 'categories.categoryBranch' = Includes categories. The related category branch data for each category ID.
  • 'clients' = The clients of the variation.
  • 'defaultCategories' = The default categories of the variation
  • 'defaultCategories.category' = Includes defaultCategories. The category data to the related category ID.
  • 'images' = The images of the variation
  • 'images.image' = Includes images. The image data to the related image ID.
  • 'markets' = The markets of the variation.
  • 'marketIdentNumbers' = The market ident numbers of the variation
  • 'salesPrices' = The sales prices of the variation.
  • 'salesPrices.salesPrice' = Includes salesPrices. The sales price data to the related sales price ID.
  • 'skus' = The skus of the variation.
  • 'supplier' = The supplier of the variation.
  • 'supplier.supplier' = Includes supplier. The contact data to the related supplier ID.
  • 'timestamps' = The timetamps of the variation.
  • 'warehouses' = The warehouses of the variation
  • 'warehouses.warehouse' = Includes warehouses. The warehouse data to the related warehouse ID.
  • 'unit' = The unit of the variation
  • 'unit.unit' = Includes unit. The unit data of the related unit ID.
  • 'tags' = The tags of the variation.
  • 'tags.tag' = Includes tags. The tag data to the related tag ID.
  • 'properties' = The properties of the variation.
  • 'properties.property' = Includes properties. The property data to the related property ID.
  • 'comments' = The comments of the variation.
  • 'inheritance' = The inheritance of the variation.

parameters.name: groupBy
parameters.description:
Groups the result. The following parameters are available:
  • 'itemId' = Groups the result by the item ID.
  • 'itemAttributeValue' = Groups the result by the attribute with the flag 'isGroupable'.

parameters.name: allAttributeValueIds
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to variations which have all specified attribute value IDs. More than one parameter should be separated by commas.

The ID of the order type

                                                          the following types are available by default:

* 1 = Sales order

* 3 = Returns
* 4 = Credit note
* 5 = Warranty
* 6 = Repair
* 7 = Offer
* 8 = Advance order
* 9 = Multi-order
* 10 = Multi credit note
* 11 = Multi delivery
* 12 = Reorder
* 13 = Partial delivery
* 14 = Subscription
* 15 = Redistribution optional allowed values are 15

get.description:
Lists stock movements for a warehouse. The ID of the warehouse must be specified. To get movements older than 3 months, set the 'year' parameter.
NOTE: You can either get archive entries or non-archive entries. You can not get entries for the current year that are younger and older than 3 months with one request. You need separate requests to get entries older and younger than 3 months. To get all entries younger than 3 month you do not need to specify a year or any createdAt parameter.

parameters.name: with
parameters.description:
Includes the specified information in the results. More than one parameter should be separated by commas. The following parameters are available:
  • 'names' = The names of the property.
  • 'amazon' = The amazon values of the property.
  • 'options' = The options of the property.
  • 'groups' = The groups of the property.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sorts the results. Append '_asc' or '_desc' to specify the sorting order. '_desc' is the default value if no other is specified.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The requested page of results. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of results per page. Maximum value is 250. Default value is 50.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have have a matching ID. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in', 'gte', 'gt', 'lte', 'lt', 'between'

parameters.name: cast
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have have a matching cast. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have have a matching group id. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have have a matching name. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'like'

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have have a matching type. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching updatedAt. Possible search operators are: 'between', 'gte', 'lte', 'gt', 'lt'.

parameters.name: option.units
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching option with the type units. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'.

parameters.name: option.vatId
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching option with the type vatId. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'.

parameters.name: option.displayOrder
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching option with the type displayOrder. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'.

parameters.name: option.markup
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching option with the type markup. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'.

parameters.name: option.mandatoryField
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching option with the type mandatoryField. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'.

parameters.name: option.orderProcess
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching option with the type orderProcess. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'.

parameters.name: option.customerRegistration
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching option with the type customerRegistration. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'.

parameters.name: option.contactSearch
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching option with the type contactSearch. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'.

parameters.name: visibility.referrers
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching visibility with the type referrers. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'.

parameters.name: visibility.clients
parameters.description: Filter restricts the list of results to properties which have a matching visibility with the type clients. Possible search operators are: 'eq', 'in'.

parameters.name: visibility.display

mode.description:
The mode describes the criteria based on which pending amounts are assigned to a debtor account. The following modes are available:
  • character = The debtor accounts are selected based on the first character of customer information. The information and the order of the information that will be used are defined with the sequence. There are 3 different sequences available.
  • payment = The debtor accounts are selected based on the payment method.
  • country = The debtor accounts are selected based on the country of delivery.
  • country_payment = The debtor accounts are selected based on two criteria. The first criteria is the country and if the country is same as the country of the accounting location then the payment method is used to select the deptor account.

sequence.description:
The sequence defines the order in which customer information will be used for the debtor account assignment if the character made has been chosen. The following sequences are available:
  • FNV = stands for the sequence: company, lastname, firstname
  • NVF = stands for the sequence: lastname, firstname, company
  • NFV = stands for the sequence: lastname, company, firstname

standard.description: The standard debtor account that will be used if no matching debtor account can be found.

save.description: Flag that indicates if the debtor account shall be saved within the contact data.

locationId.description: The ID of the accounting location that the configuration belongs to

blocked.description:
The blocked status of the contact. Contacts can be blocked for a specific client (store). Possible values:
  • 0 = not blocked
  • 1 = blocked

rating.description:
The rating of the contact. This rating is for internal use only. 5 red stars are for the worst and 5 yellow stars for the best rating. Possible values:
  • -5 = 5 red stars (worst rating)
  • -4 = 4 red stars
  • -3 = 3 red stars
  • -2 = 2 red stars
  • -1 = 1 red star
  • 0 = 5 grey stars, no rating saved for the contact
  • 1 = 1 yellow star
  • 2 = 2 yellow stars
  • 3 = 3 yellow stars
  • 4 = 4 yellow stars
  • 5 = 5 yellow stars (best rating)

bookAccount.description:
The book account (debtor account) of the contact.
An additional, separate number that generally corresponds to the customer number or
the debtor number in your financial accounting.

configId.description: Filter that restricts the search result to key figure results of key figure configuration id. The id of the key figure configuration is mandatory and must be specified, if no value is passed for id.

interval.description: Time interval in which the result was calculated: day, week, month, quarter, year.

dimension.description: This field will be removed until 11.2020

dimensions.description: Filter that restricts the search result to key figure results of one data group. The dimension must be specified.

scaleBasis.description: Filter restricts the list of results to items with a scale base time during the specified period. For the time interval day, a date or comma separated two dates (format: YYYYMMDD) can be specified. For the time interval week, several comma-separated days (YYYYMMDD) of different weeks can be specified. For the interval month, a comma separated list of months is expected e.g. 2020-01, 2020-02.

resultId.description: Return ID of key figure result

resultUnit.description: Return unit of the primary result.

aggregateFunction.description: Define aggregate (group) function that will operate on key figure results. Default function: sum. Allowed values: sum, avg, count, max, min

itemsPerPage.description: Limits the number of results listed per page to a specific number. The number of variations to be listed per page must be specified. The default number of results is 12 and the maximum is 100.

page.description: Number of the requested page, default value: 1

searchId.description: Identification string to assign the result

calculatedAt.description: Filter that restricts the search result to key figure results which have been calculated as of this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:II:SS)

displayZeroPrimaryValue.description: Display zero results on the UI

after.description: The last evaluated key as base64, provide that as the starting point for the next query (pagination).

plentyId.description: The unique plenty ID of the client (store) in which the category is visible. If a subcategory is linked to a client, its parent categories will be linked to this client as well.

lang.description: The language of the category

name.description: The name of the category. The same category name can be used more than once in different categories or on different category levels. However, category names must be unique within the same category or level.

description.description: The category text. The description is inserted into the online store using template variables.

description2.description: The category text 2. The description 2 is inserted into the online store using template variables.

shortDescription.description: The short description of the category. The short description can be inserted into the store's design using template variables.

metaKeywords.description: HTML meta keywords to tag the category for search engines. More than one keyword can be separated by commas.

metaDescription.description: The meta description of the category. This description is analysed by search engines and displayed in search results. This text should be treated as an advertising text to maximise click-through from search engine result pages. Current recommended limit is 156 characters.

nameUrl.description:
The category name to be used for the category's URL. The same URL name can be used more than once in different categories or on different category levels. However, URL names must be unique within the same category or level. The URL name should not be changed once the category is indexed by search engines. If no URL name is specified, the name will automatically be used as the URL name when the category is created.
Important: Name should contain ASCII code only and no special characters. The following character strings may not be used as prefixes to URL names: a-, b-, c-, f-, fa-, p-, t-. These prefixes will be removed automatically. For instance, a-class will be changed to class automatically. However, the URL name aclass can be used for a category named A-class.

metaTitle.description: This will be displayed as the title of a tab in the web browser and as a search result in search engines. If this is left blank, the category name will be used as the title. Current recommended limit is 50 characters. Longer titles will be cut off.

image.description: The ID to the image1 of the category.

image2.description: The ID to the image2 of the category.

imagePath.description: The path to the image1 of the category.

image2Path.description: The path to the image2 of the category.

position.description: The position of the category within a category level.

itemListView.description: The template the category is linked to for the category overview. The template determines what the category overview will look like for this category. This option is available for categories of the type Item only. Possible values: ItemViewCategoriesList, ItemViewCategoriesList2 to ItemViewCategoriesList10.

singleItemView.description: The template the category is linked to for the single item view. The template determines the appearance of the single item design for this category. This option is available for categories of the type Item only. Possible values: ItemViewSingleItem, ItemViewSingleItem2 to ItemViewSingleItem5.

fulltext.description:
Flag that indicates if the complete category text, i.e. the complete description, will be searched.
  • Y = Complete text will be searched.
  • N = Text will not be searched completely.

metaRobots.description:
Values from the meta element Robots are analyzed by Web crawlers. These values tell the crawler what it should do with the page and with the links on the page.
  • all = Include this category in the search engine index and follow the links on the page.
  • index = Include in the search engine index.
  • nofollow = Do not follow the links on the page.
  • noindex = Do not include in the search engine index.
  • nofollow, noindex = Do not follow the links and do not include the category in the search engine index.

canonicalLink.description:
The URL of any category that contains the same content. This
will avoid duplicate content.

id.description: The ID of the item. The ID must be unique.

position.description: The position of the item

itemType.description:
The type of the item. Because Set items are managed using a separate route,
this value is always Default.

stockType.description:
The stock type of the item. Possible values:
  • 0 = Stocked item (default)
  • 1 = Production item
  • 2 = Colli
  • 3 = Special order item

storeSpecial.description:
Option to present items more prominently in the online store.
  • 1 = Special offer
  • 2 = New items
  • 3 = Top items

ownerId.description: The plentymarkets user that is assigned as owner of this item.

manufacturerId.description: The ID of the manufacturer of the item

producingCountryId.description: The ID of the country in which the item was manufactured.

mainVariationId.description: The ID of the main variation of the item. The ID must be unique.

revenueAccount.description:
The revenue account the item is linked to.
An individual revenue account can be saved for each item in plentymarkets.
If this is not done, plentymarkets automatically determines a revenue account
based on the VAT rate.

couponRestriction.description:
Indicates if the item can be purchased using a promotional coupon.
  • 0 = Permitted
  • 1 = Not permitted
  • 2 = Purchasable with coupon only

condition.description:
The condition of the item. Possible values:
  • 0 = New
  • 1 = Used
  • 2 = Boxed as new
  • 3 = New with label
  • 4 = Factory seconds

conditionApi.description:
The condition of the item that is transferred to markets via API.
  • 0 = New
  • 1 = Used but as new
  • 2 = Used but very good
  • 3 = Used but good
  • 4 = Used but acceptable
  • 5 = Factory seconds

createdAt.description: Timestamp of the date and time the item was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last date and time the item was updated.

isSubscribable.description:
Flag that indicates if the item can be ordered as a subscription item.
If yes, the item can be ordered for delivery at regular intervals.

isSerialNumber.description:
Flag that indicates if serial numbers are to be assigned to variations of this item
to uniquely identify every item sold. Serial numbers ensure traceability of an item
in case of errors or problems.

isShippingPackage.description: Flag that indicates if a shipping package is to be used for this item. If yes and the variation's dimensions are entered in the Settings tab of a variation, the correct shipping package is assigned automatically.

amazonFbaPlatform.description:
Indicates the platform used for Fulfilment by Amazon (FBA).
  • 0 = Do not use
  • 1 = AMAZON EU (Europe)
  • 2 = AMAZON FE (Far East)
  • 3 = AMAZON NA (North America)

isShippableByAmazon.description:
Flag that indicates if the item can be shipped with Amazon Multi-Channel.
Amazon Multi-Channel Fulfillment is a service for fulfilling orders from sales
channels other than Amazon platforms using inventory stored in the Amazon
fulfillment center.

amazonProductType.description:
The Amazon product type of the item. List of IDs:
https://www.plentymarkets.co.uk/manual/data-exchange/data-formats/item/

amazonFedas.description: The FEDAS product classification key of the item.

ebayPresetId.description:
The eBay preset ID. This plentymarkets ID must be specified to save values for
$ebayCategory, $ebayCategory2, $ebayStoreCategory and $ebayStoreCategory2.

ebayCategory.description: The eBay category 1 of the item. This category is used when a new listing is created.

ebayCategory2.description: The eBay category 2 of the item. This category is used when a new listing is created.

ebayStoreCategory.description:
The ID of the eBay store category 1 of the item.
This value is used for new listings.

ebayStoreCategory2.description:
The ID of the eBay store category 2 of the item.
This value is used for new listings.

rakutenCategoryId.description: The ID of the Rakuten category of this item.

flagOne.description:
Flag 1 of the item. Flags can be used to organise and filter items.
Each item can be assigned up to two flags. Possible values: 1 to 31, 0 = no flag

flagTwo.description:
Flag 2 of the item. Flags can be used to organise and filter items.
Each item can be assigned up to two flags. Possible values: 1 to 11, 0 = no flag

ageRestriction.description:
The age customers must be to purchase the item. Items with an age rating of 18+ must be linked to a shipping profile for which the PostIdent option is activated.
  • 0 = None available
  • 3 = Released for ages 3 and up
  • 6 = Ages 6 and up
  • 9 = Ages 9 and up
  • 12 = Ages 12 and up
  • 14 = Ages 14 and up
  • 16 = Ages 16 and up
  • 18 = Ages 18 and up
  • 50 = Not marked
  • 88 = Not required
  • 99 = Unknown

feedback.description:
The feedback, i.e. rating, that this item received.
Possible values are 1 to 5 or 1 to 10 depending on the maximum rating setting.
An initial feedback can be saved for items. The saved value will then be displayed as the
initial feedback. Every time new feedback is submitted, the average value will be
recalculated automatically.

free1.description: The content of the free text field 1. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free2.description: The content of the free text field 2. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

free3.description: The content of the free text field 3. This can be displayed in the online store or on eBay.

maximumOrderQuantity.description:
The maximum order quantity of an item permitted per order.
If a maximum order quantity is specified, no more than this quantity of any
combination of the variations of the item can be ordered.
Decimal values are possible to allow orders by weight or length.
Default value is 0. If value is 0, the maximum order quantity is unlimited.

customsTariffNumber.description:
Deprecated: The customs tariff number of the item;
usually a 11 digit code number based on the Harmonised System

The type of referrer for which the image is available. Possible types:
  • mandant = The image can be made available for clients (stores).
  • marketplace = The image can be made available for markets.

For the type mandant, this is the plentyID of the client (store) for which the image is available. For the types marketplace and listing, this is the ID of the referrer for which the image is available.

The cross-selling relationship between item and cross-selling item. Possible values:
  • Accessory = The cross-selling item is an accessory of the item.
  • ReplacementPart = The cross-selling item is a replacement part for the item.
  • Similar = The cross-selling item is similar to the item.

The path will be assigned automatically by plentymarkets when the item is created and will be displayed as part of the URL when the item is selected in the online store.

parentSku.description: The Parent SKU of the variation. The Parent SKU is adjustable. The same Parent SKU value should be used on variations of same article.

status.description: The status of the variation after the export. Possible entries are INACTIVE, ERROR, SENT and ACTIVE.

id.description: The ID of the log entry

integration.description: The integration key used for the log entry. Used as a first level allocation.

referenceValue.description: Deprecated field, see the references field instead.

level.description: The level this current log entry belongs to. Notice! When storing log entries with level "report" the entries will actually be stored as level "info". The difference between "report" and "info" is that log entries with level "report" do not need prior activation.

additionalInfo.description: Additional information that need to also be stored. Can be an int, string or object.

references.description: All the reference types and values correlated with this log entry.

fulfillmentPolicyId.description: The ID of the fulfillment policy.

description.description: An optional seller-defined description of the fulfillment policy.

freightShipping.description: Set this value to true to indicate the seller offers freight shipping.

globalShipping.description: If this value is set to true, it indicates the seller has opted-in to the eBay Global Shipping Program and that they use that service for thier internation shipments.

localPickup.description: If this value is set to true, it indicates the seller offers local pickup of their items.

marketplaceId.description: The ID of the eBay marketplace to which this fulfillment policy applies. If this value is not specified, value defaults to the seller's eBay registration site.

name.description: A user-defined name for this fulfillment policy. Names must be unique for policies assigned to the same marketplace.

pickupDropOff.description: If this value is set to true, it indicates the seller offers the "Click and Collect" feature.

name.description: A recommended Item Specific name.

minValues.description: Minimum number of values that you can specify for this Item Specific.

maxValues.description: Maximum number of values that you can specify for this Item Specific.

selectionMode.description: Controls whether you can specify your own name and value in listing requests, or if you need to use a name and/or value that eBay has defined.

valueType.description: The data type (e.g., date) that eBay expects the value to adhere to in listing requests. Only returned if the data type is not Text. In some cases, more details about the data type are returned in the `valueFormat` field.

valueFormat.description: The format of the data type (e.g., date format) that eBay expects the item specific's value to adhere to in listing requests. A data type identified by the `valueType` field may have different representations, and `valueFormat` specifies the precise format that is required.

helpText.description: Help-text defines the purpose of the Item Specific. The help text will be shown only when it is available for the particular Item Specific.

helpUrl.description: A page on the eBay Web site with context-specific help tips that provide useful information about this Item Specific. Only returned when an applicable page is available in the system.

variationPicture.description: Indicates whether the name (e.g., Color) can (or must) be used to classify the variation pictures

variationSpecifics.description: Indicates whether the recommended name/value pair can be used as variation attributes in a fixed-price listing call. For example, a given category could disable a name like Brand in variation specifics (if Brand is only allowed in the item specifics at the Item level). The same category could enable a name like Size for variation specifics (in addition to recommending it for item specifics). If not returned, then the name/value can be used for both variation specifics and item specifics.

siteId.description: The ID of the site exactly as eBay specifies it in the docs. This value is/was used in the old eBay SOAP APIs

marketplaceId.description: The ID of the marketplace exactly as eBay specifies it in the docs. This value is used in the new eBay REST APIs. Eg. `EBAY_DE` or `EBAY-DE`

marketId.description: System-Listing wide internal ID for the listing marketplace. This id occurs only in correlation with the listing DB tables.

referrerId.description: System wide internal ID for the marketplace. Use this instead of `marketId` whenever possible!

currency.description: The currency used for the marketplace

paymentPolicyId.description: The ID of the payment policy.

description.description: An optional seller-defined description of the payment policy. (Max length: 250)

immediatePay.description: Indicate if the payment is due upon receipt or not. (eBay generates a receipt when the buyer agrees to purchase an item)

marketplaceId.description: The ID of the eBay marketplace to which this return policy applies. If this value is not specified, value defaults to the seller's eBay registration site.

name.description: A user-defined name for this payment policy. Names must be unique for policies assigned to the same marketplace. (Max length: 64)

paymentInstructions.description: Allows the seller to give payment instructions to the buyer. These instructions appear on the eBay View Item and Checkout pages.

returnPolicyId.description: The ID of the return policy.

description.description: An optional seller-defined description of the return policy.

extendedHolidayReturnsOffered.description: If this value is set to true, it indicates the seller offers an Extended Holiday Returns policy for their listings.

marketplaceId.description: The ID of the eBay marketplace to which this return policy applies. If this value is not specified, value defaults to the seller's eBay registration site.

name.description: A user-defined name for this fulfillment policy. Names must be unique for policies assigned to the same marketplace.

refundMethod.description: Indicates the method the seller uses to compensate the buyer for returned items. The return method specified applies only to remorse returns. Available options: `MERCHANDISE_CREDIT`, `MONEY_BACK`.

restockingFeePercentage.description: Sellers who accept returns should include this field if they charge buyers a restocking fee when items are returned.

returnInstruction.description: This optional free-form string field lets the seller provide a detailed explanation of the return policy.

returnInstructions.description: This optional free-form string field lets the seller provide a detailed explanation of the return policy.

returnMethod.description: This field indicates the method in which the seller handles non-money back return requests for remorse returns. Sellers can specify they either exchange or replace items. Available options: `EXCHANGE`, `REPLACEMENT`.

returnsAccepted.description: Set this value to true to indicate the seller accepts returns.

returnShippingCostPayer.description: The seller uses this value to specify whether the buyer or the seller is responsible for paying return shipping charges. The field can be set to either `BUYER` or `SELLER`.

  • Billing address = 1

id.description: The ID of a coupon campaign

externalId.description: DEPRECATED! The external ID of a coupon campaign

name.description: The name of the coupon campaign

variable.description: The variable to display coupon codes in emails. There are only 10 variables available. A variable may only be used for one campaign. The variable names follow this pattern: CouponCode + Number e.g. CouponCode1.

isPermittedForExternalReferrers.description:
Flag that indicates whether or not coupons can be redeemed if a customer enters the online store from an external referrer.
  • TRUE = The coupon can be redeemed if the customer enters the online store from an external referrer 
  • FALSE = The coupon can not be redeemed

includeShipping.description: The discount also applies to shipping costs. The property will be only be set if the discount type fixed is set.

unusedCodesCount.description: The number of codes that have been redeemed

usedCodesCount.description: The number of codes that have not been redeemed

endsAt.description: The date that the campaign ends

startsAt.description: The date that the campaign starts

minOrderValue.description: The minimum order value that needs to be reached for the coupon to be redeemed. If the value is not reached the coupon will not be redeemed.

codeDurationWeeks.description: The number of weeks that codes of this campaign can be redeemed after they have been generated.

codeAssignment.description:
The code assignment is only relevant for vouchers. Codes can either be generated every time a voucher is bought or a code from a previously created list of codes can be used. The three options available are generate, use_existing and only_use_existing.
  • generate = a new code is generated on demand
  • use_existing = the code already exists and is taken from a previously entered list of codes, in case of vouchers a new code will be generated for each item purchased that has associated a campaign ID
  • only_use_existing = the code already exists and is taken from a previously entered list of codes, for vouchers no additional code will be generated for items purchased, only existing codes will be used

codeLength.description: There are 3 different length available. The code can be 6, 16, 24 or 32 characters long.

usage.description:
The usage defines what the coupon codes from this campaign can be used for. There are three options available:
  • single_and_subscription = The codes can be used for single orders and subscription orders
  • single_order = The codes can be used for single orders only
  • subscription = The codes can be used for subscriptions only

concept.description:
The campaign concept defines how many codes belong to a campaign. The concept interacts with the redeem type that is explained next. There are two concept options available:
  • single_code = The campaign has only one code
  • multi_code = The campaign has several codes

redeemType.description:
The redeem type defines how many times a code of a campaign can be redeemed. There are 4 redeem types available:
  • multi_redeem_per_user = Each customer is allowed to redeem the same code several times
  • single_redeem_per_user = Each customer can only redeem the same code once
  • redeem_until_value_reached = A code can be entered several times by the same customer or by different customers, but only until the coupon value is depleted
  • unique_redeem = The code can be redeemed once. If several customers get the same code, only the first customer to enter the code can use it.
The redeem type interacts with the concept. Pay attention to the combination these two options form.

discountType.description:
There are 4 discount types available:
  • fixed = The coupon value is a fixed amount of money. This discount type is the only one that makes sense for coupons that are sold in the online store. The actual amount of money needs to be set with the value property.
  • percent = The discount is given as percentage and the actual value depends on the purchase. The actual number of percent need to be set with the value property.
  • item = The discount applies to entire items. A typical example would be - Buy 1 get 1 free - or in other words - Get 2 for the price of 1. The number of items the customer gets and the number of items the customer has to pay for need to be set with itemDiscountToPay and itemDiscountToBuy.
  • shipping = The shipping does not cost anything. The cost will be set to zero no matter what the actual shipping costs are.

itemDiscountToPay.description: The number of items that the customer has to pay for. This number needs to be compared to the number of items the customer receives, itemDiscountToBuy

itemDiscountToBuy.description: The number of items that the customer receives, but he or she only has to pay for the number of items set with itemDiscountToPay.

campaignType.description: The two campaign types available are coupon or voucher.

couponType.description: The coupon type is only for campaigns that have the campaign type coupon. The two coupon types available are promotion and sales.

description.description: The description of the campaign

value.description: The actual discount value of a coupon. The value needs to be set for the two discount types fixed and percent.

campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign that the code belongs to

disable.description:
Flag that indicates if a code is active or deactivated.
  • True = the code is deactivated
  • False = the code is active

consumed.description:
Flag that indicates if a code was redeemed or not.
  • True = the code was redeemed
  • False = the code is not redeemed

usedCount.description: How many times a code has been redeemed

usedAmount.description: The amount that is already redeemed. The total amount that can be redeemed is defined in the campaign as coupon value, because the value applies to all codes of a campaign.

value.description: The value of the coupon if it differs from the campaign value. The value is null if the campaign value is used.

validationType.description: The type of the campaign. Currently the only type available is plentymarkets.

contactId.description: The ID of the contact that wants to redeem the coupon

currency.description: The currency of the purchase

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate of the purchase (optional, is loaded from settings if not given)

salesDiscount.description: The total discount from a coupon applied to an order. The discount is given as gross amount.

salesDiscountNet.description: The net discount from a coupon applied to an order. The net discount is the total discount minus the vat amount.

itemDiscount.description: The discount amount applied to items.

itemDiscountNet.description: The net discount applied to items.

shippingDiscount.description: The discount applied to shipping costs.

shippingDiscountNet.description: The net discount applied to shipping costs.

usedVatFields.description: The vat fields used for the validation

checkedItems.description: The list of variations that passed the validation

contactId.description: The ID of the contact that redeemed the coupon

openAmount.description: The coupon amount that can still be redeemed

redeemCount.description: How many times a coupon code has already been redeemed

updatedAt.description: The date that the coupon code was updated last.

campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign that the coupon belongs to

externalTransactionId.description: The ID that is assigned to a coupon by the external coupon service provider, when the coupon is redeemed.

currency.description: The ISO 4217 code and id of the currency.

htmlCode.description: The html code (entity) for the currency.

unicodeSign.description: The unicode symbol for the currency. If no unicode symbol exists, the html code will be used.

isActive.description: Flag that indicates if the currency is active in the system or not. Currencies are activated per sales price.

isErasable.description:
Flag that indicates if this currency can be deleted or not.
  • False = Currency cannot be deleted
  • True = Currency can be deleted

exchangeRate.description: The current exchange rate for this currency.

id.description: The country id.

name.description: The system country name.

active.description: The active flag (1: active, 2: backend active, 3: supplier active

storehouseId.description: The id of the main warehouse in this country.

isoCode2.description: The ISO 3166 ALPHA-2 code of the country.

isoCode3.description: The ISO 3166 ALPHA-3 code of the country.

lang.description: The main language spoken in the country.

isCountryStateMandatory.description: Flag that states if a country state is mandatory for the country.

vatCodes.description: An array with country vat codes.

* WAREHOUSE		              =	1

  • 323: Stock correction because quality models are booked in
  • 324: Stock correction because quality models are booked out
  • 325: Stock correction because of gift
  • 326: Stock correction because of malfunction (without return)
  • 327: Stock correction because of loss
  • 328: Stock correction because of unpack
